changeSet.sql: --delimiter $$ CREATE TRIGGER transactions_u_trg AFTER UPDATE ON transactions FOR EACH ROW BEGIN SIGNAL SQLSTATE '45000' SET MESSAGE_TEXT = 'update is not permitted'; END$$ --delimiter ;

changeSet.sql: --delimiter $$ CREATE TRIGGER transactions_d_trg AFTER DELETE ON transactions FOR EACH ROW BEGIN SIGNAL SQLSTATE '45000' SET MESSAGE_TEXT = 'delete is not permitted'; END$$ --delimiter ;
